newsitem.title: ITALY: S&P keeps Italy's BNL on credit watch.
newsitem.headline: S&P keeps Italy's BNL on credit watch.

text.p: Standard and Poor's said it was keeping Banco Nazionale del Lavoro's 'A-/A-2' ratings on credit watch with negative implications following its joint acquisition of a majority stake in Banco di Napoli.
S&P said Banco di Napoli's B short term rating remained on credit watch with positive implications.

"In the weeks ahead Standard and Poor's will resolve the credit watch situation after examining the implications of the acquisition of Banco di Napoli for both banks' business and financial profiles," S&P said in a statement.
